de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util

Class MenuRenderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.util.MenuRenderHelper

  • public class MenuRenderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Consists of static methods useful when rendering textures in the UI

    • Method Summary
